title: Tis The Season For Romance
description: Tis The Season For Romance is an abundance of heartfelt wishes, a touch of Christmas magic, and a guaranteed happy ever after, all while celebrating this most joyful time of the year.Bestselling and Award-Winning authors fill your holiday stocking with novellas ranging from sweet to sassy, bursting with excitement and anticipation for the upcoming Christmas holiday.The amazing authors contributing to this set include:Kathleen RyderSusan HorsnellJosie JohnstonDiana DawnMary MoranoJ.F. LoweA.M. OlenickAndra DillMaddison ColeArgentina RyderSusannah KadeJakki FrancesSue PriceLouisa DuvalAva BariLorah JaiynKat ParrishAmy StephensB. LivingstoneAshley BrionTricia Schneider
author: Kathleen Ryder
